mapper.select: SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) FROM PAYMENT WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) FROM PAYMENT WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND STATUS = '대기' AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) FROM PAYMENT WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND STATUS = '완료' AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT PAYMENT_NO AS paymentNo, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, AMOUNT AS amount, PAYMENT_DATE AS paymentDate, STATUS AS status FROM PAYMENT WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE DESC
